General.Name: LoopUp Group PLC
General.Description: LoopUp Group plc provides cloud communications platform for business-critical external and specialist communications in the United Kingdom, the European Union, North America, and internationally. The company offers cloud telephony services, including fully managed direct routing solution for Microsoft Teams calling; conferencing solutions for remote meetings; and managed events calls services. It serves multinationals, SMEs, public sector bodies, and professional service firms. LoopUp Group plc was incorporated in 2016 and is headquartered in London, the United Kingdom.
General.Address: The Tea Building, London, United Kingdom, E1 6JJ
